name: made a game with chatGPT
description:
Controls:

  • WASD/arrow keys: move
  • left click: shoot

I asked chatGPT to make me a Gamemaker studio 2 game. It took a few back and forths before it nailed the subtleties of GML but this took about 15min to make.

I drew the artwork myself.

Disclaimer: I obviously have no idea who orignally wrote that code, I assume chatGPT stole it from a GML platformer tutorial available on google.
